author: Steven Overly
title: Google wielding its vast troves of phone-tracking data in virus fight
description: Reports published by the search giant will show how well residents in 131 countries, including the U.S., are following pleas to stay home.
content: Despite Google's assurances, the revelation could add to the scrutiny that large tech companies have faced in recent years for the way they store, secure and share people's highly sensitive personal information after a series of high-profile privacy lapses. S… [+3454 chars]
